snippet.title: Undercover Cops Gaiden: Hakaishin Garumaa (GB) - Full Run / Longplay
snippet.description:
This game was so obscure that nobody has tried to do a full longplay of this game, and as there are no guides on GameFAQs I had to do the dirty work myself.

To be able to cross the barrier in Stage 3, successfully solve the 10-round quiz. As for Will, the fight is a hopeless boss fight in which she will dodge every attack that you can throw at her, and as getting your HP reduced to 0 means Game Over, the only thing to do is escape. Even if it looks like the attempt failed do it three times and then the fight will abruptly end. 

Due to safety reasons such as copyright issues, this video is part of a Non-Monetized Channel. 

Note: In order for my videos to be GameAnyone exclusives, I have changed my upload policy. I will still be uploading playthroughs, but in order to get the full experience, visit gameanyone.com/Warblefly41. Otherwise, you will not hear any commentary from me, no matter how high you set your volume.
